a.title: Student Account Balances and Payment Options

div.a: Student Account Balances and Payment Options

nav.div: Joplin Schools » Departments » Food and Nutrition Services » Meals During School Closure

strong.span: * UPDATE! * CHANGE OF PROCEDURE! * UPDATE! * CHANGE OF PROCEDURE! * UPDATE! *

span.span: In an effort to reduce exposure to you and to our Food Service personnel, beginning April 20th, we are altering the procedure for distributing our “Grab and Go” meals. This change will help to protect both our community and our staff by reducing contact time. Joplin Schools Food and Nutrition Services will continue to provide a “Grab and Go” Curbside Meal pick up service during the COVID-19 closures ONLY on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday. Meals will be provided on a first come, first serve basis at all school sites from 11:00 am until noon and updated Bus Drop-Off Locations

span.style: background: white; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial;

span.span: All meals will be standard meals with some perishable foods. Families are responsible to monitor perishable food for safety. Monday and Wednesday meals will consist of two lunches and two breakfasts per child. Friday meals will consist of three lunches and three breakfasts per child. Due to the Stay-At-Home Order, children do not have to be present in order to receive meals. Any child, 18 years old and under, is eligible to receive meals at “No Charge”.

p.span: Thank you for allowing us to serve you during this difficult time.

span.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Arial; font-size: 16px;
